title: Much of the AI content we have seen so far is meaningless, but this video from the Johan Cruyff Foundation really surprised me üé•üí´
description:
Much of the AI content we have seen so far is meaningless, but this video from the Johan Cruyff Foundation really surprised me üé•üí´ 

Turning iconic photos, mixing important moments and putting them in chronological order to tell a life story is a simple and fantastic way of paying tribute. And it finally really shows one of the credible possibilities of generative AI.

#credible #ai #storytelling
content: Much of the AI content we have seen so far is meaningless, but this video from the Johan Cruyff Foundation really surprised me üé•üí´
author: Jeffrey van Maurik

raw_jsonld.headline: Much of the AI content we have seen so far is meaningless, but this video from the Johan Cruyff Foundation really surprised me üé•üí´

comment.text: This is a great use of this storytelling framework (I see it a lot on Instagram for a lot less interesting individuals) - within 90 seconds you get a full sense of Johan's career leading to the Foundation's creation. Was this shared by the Foundation here on Linkedin or TikTok/Instgram, or someone created it independently. Great either way.
Jeffrey van Maurik any insights on which platforms/tools they used?

Obviously artificial. And it has a creepy aspect.  

Curious: how much time, effort, money was spent creating this?
Amazing person, on and off the pitch. Few have had more influence on modern football than #Cruijff. I typically don‚Äôt idiolize people, for him I make gladly an exception ‚öΩÔ∏èüá≥üá±üá™üá∏
Brilliantly done... almost as impressive as his genius on the pitch!
It's also a nice example where they own the rights to the used imagery. Plus it's easy to track down as well. That's good integrity for reliable sharable content.
Ai, vergeten te vermelden dat Cruyff ook met Feyenoord kampioen is geworden! :)

I was lucky enough to work with him and play golf with him at Mosa Trajectum golf resort in Murcia which he was involved in to create an olympic standard warm weather training academy for a raft of sports. Unfortunately 2008 financial crash got in the way but what a legend

title: ‚ú® Just published on Forbes!
description:
‚ú® Just published on Forbes!
I‚Äôve always believed that marketing is most powerful when it connects people to purpose. With AI, we now have the ability to scale that connection, without losing the human touch.
In this article, I explore how AI can help us bring more relevance and speed to the way we engage ‚Äî making room for more meaningful work.
If you‚Äôre exploring how to integrate AI into your marketing strategy, or simply thinking about what‚Äôs next, I hope this piece sparks fresh ideas.
Read the article:
https://lnkd.in/dpx79cnM
#MarketingWithPurpose #Forbes #FutureOfMarketing

raw_jsonld.headline: ‚ú® Just published on Forbes!

comment.text:
Interesting article, Lu! And yes‚Ä¶. we walk the talk! I‚Äôve seen the AI adoption journey unfold firsthand in the global marketing team, and it‚Äôs been a fun ride. From exchanging tips on tools and features to cool prompts and co-creating with AI as our brainstorm buddy, it‚Äôs reshaped how I think, create, and deliver.

And no, this comment was NOT written by AI. 
 But yes, ChatGPT gave it a quick review and proofread. üòâ
Proud to be on this journey with you, boss Luciana Cemerka de Aguiar ‚ú®
Incredible insights, Luciana! A powerful reflection on the future of marketing, and one that truly embodies our vision. Proud to see this perspective featured in Forbes.
Definitely worth reading. Congratulations on sharing this with us and giving your impactful work with IA. Best wishes

Fantastic read, Lu! üôå
It‚Äôs always valuable to reflect on how we can keep up with the rapidly expanding role of AI, while still honoring the uniquely human nuances of critical and creative thinking. Also, great tips! I‚Äôve been using Google‚Äôs NotebookLM and it‚Äôs quickly become one of my favorite tools for surfacing context-specific insights. It definitely deserves more credit!

I‚Äôm excited about what lies ahead and what we can create together! ‚ú®
Definitely worth reading Luciana Cemerka de Aguiar

Wow, Luciana, such a refreshing read! Loved how you frame AI as a way to scale meaning without losing the human spark ü§©. It‚Äôs rare to find that mix of purpose, tech and heart so well-articulated. Your piece left me inspired. Thank you for sharing such a timely perspective!

title: Are you wondering how Agentic AI moves from hype to measurable business outcomes in enterprise space?
description:
Are you wondering how Agentic AI moves from hype to measurable business outcomes in enterprise space?

Most AI deployments are fragmented, and sometimes just seen as a tool without accountability for outcomes. The question isn‚Äôt if AI matters anymore; it‚Äôs how you deploy it cohesively across complex media flows breaking silos across functions. 

In the current episode of Full Tech Ahead, Amanda Razani talks with our CEO, Rajeev Butani, about leveraging Agentic AI for growth operations. 

MediaMint's persona-based Agentic AI model delivers up to 70% efficiency gains in campaign optimization, media planning, and operations, proving that AI, when applied strategically, creates measurable impact.

Watch for insights on strategic adoption, operational ownership, and aligning technology with outcomes that actually matter: https://bit.ly/4ovXaRR

#MediaMint #AgenticAI #AdTech #EfficiencyatScale
